metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8945 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The proglottis Go wrapper before 0.1.1 for the GPGME library has a use-after-free, as demonstrated by use for container image pulls by Docker or CRI-O. This leads to a crash or potential code execution during GPG signature verification.

criterions.comment: singularity-container: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
